channel.title: Blog on Tarentola Digital
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Tarentola Digital

item.title: Released our first game: NiceFart.io
item.description:
We’re so happy today because our first game is online now!
NiceFart.io is a online multiplayer game for browsers based in a hilarious world where the players are butts trying to beat other players eating beans, and shooting farts.

This game is similar to agar.io or slither.io, games where your goal is eat and become the biggest player. For now, the game is available for browser, but we’re working hard to have soon versions for Android and iOS.

We made NiceFart.io with love, and we hope you enjoy it!

More information on our NiceFart.io section.

Play NiceFart.io

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
Hello! This is our first post. Welcome to our site, it’s a really minimalistic site, we know! But, we think the most important thing for a game studio are their games.

We are so close to launch our very first title, an online multiplayer game for browser, Android and Iphone. Please, follow us on Twitter and Facebook to keep updated!

Let the games speak for themselves!
